entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , St. Peter's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hart Island 07:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: NNW 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
